title: Martin Sorrell’s Comeback Plan: Take Down WPP and Other Giants
sub_head: The fallen ad chief is taking potshots at the giant he built over three decades, before quitting under pressure.
body:
LONDON—Martin Sorrell built WPP PLC into the world’s largest advertising agency over three decades through a combination of impatience, drive and the occasional angry outburst.
Not a lot has changed.
